content:
Nassim Haramein is a theoretical physicist and cosmologist who has proposed a number of unorthodox ideas and theories. He has written several books, articles, and papers on his ideas and theories, these include:

Books:

* "The Structure of Atomic Nuclei" (co-authored with Elizabeth Rauscher)
* "The Connected Universe"
* "The Schwarzschild Proton"
* "The Elegant Universe: From the Illusion of Separation to Unification"
* "The Black Whole Revolution"

Articles:

* "The Schwarzschild Proton"
* "The Unification of Classical Physics"
* "The Holographic Mass"
* "The Origin of Spin"
* "The Vacuum: The Source of Space and Time"

Lectures:

* "The Schwarzschild Proton"
* "The Connected Universe"
* "The Elegant Universe"
* "The Black Whole Revolution"
